text.data: Sauzer: Did you see it, Palpaleos... The true power of the Holy Dragons... And the one who speaks with them... This power... is mine... Even without using the girl...[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer! Are you okay?![end]
Lukia: [character][0x0]! Get up![end]

Lukia: I'll take care of everyone. [character][0x0], save [character][0x1]!
Be careful, there's still an enemy general here![end]
Lukia: Is [character][0x1] okay?[end]
I'm scared... What... what's going to happen to me...?[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]![end]
Sendak: Princess...[end]
Sendak: ......!?[end]
Lukia: What was that? Everybody's wounds have healed![end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]... And we just met after all this... What a cruel fate...[end]
Sendak: Matelite! The princess is breathing! She's alright![end]

Matelite: Oh... [character][0x1]... You're alright, [character][0x1]!
This will not do! Okay, [character][0x0]. Let's carry her![end]
Palpaleos: You called?[end]
Palpaleos: Princess [character][0x1]... You can't sleep?[end]
[character][0x1]: We're going to see the Holy Dragon, aren't we?[end]
Palpaleos: Let's not talk about that now.[end]
[character][0x1]: Then, tell me about something. Something you're good at, Palpaleos.[end]
Palpaleos: Something I'm good at...[end]
[character][0x1]: How about what you talked to me about before? About battle strategies and tactics.[end]
Palpaleos: ...I'm sorry. I don't know about any topics that a woman would find interesting.[end]
[character][0x1]: That's not true. I was happy... Nobody would ever talk to me about that sort of thing before...[end]
[character][0x1]: General! General Palpaleos![end]
Girl... this is the end of the dream...[end]
Who are you...?[end]
I am the Holy Dragon Valitora...[end]
Valitora... A Holy Dragon...[end]

Girl... So you are the legendary...
The one who reads the minds of the Holy Dragons...[end]
I... I don't know anything. I don't know about any legend.[end]
Girl who doesn't know the legend... If so, then who are you...[end]

I'm... Kahna's...
No... I'm nobody.[end]
Girl who is nobody... Weak-minded girl... Girl who speaks with the Holy Dragons...[end]
Gather the minds of we Holy Dragons. If you are worthy, we shall grant you power...[end]
And then you shall become a Dragnar...[end]
A Dragnar? I'll become a Dragnar?[end]
That is up to you. If you become a Dragnar, the world shall be yours...[end]
I... don't need the world... I...[end]
Please... the rest... of the dream...[end]
Palpaleos: You're... [character][0x0]?[end]
Palpaleos: ......[end]

Palpaleos: I have heard about you many times from the princess...
[character][0x0], captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad... I retrny hep to you[end][end]
